channel.title: Week 5: Optimization on PSU Astro 528
channel.description: Recent content in Week 5: Optimization on PSU Astro 528

item.title: Learning goals
item.description: Week 5 Exercises Profile code Identify type instability Write type stable functions Identify common inefficiencies Optimize code for serial execution Project Profile code to identify code worth optimizing Document code to increase chances of useful feedback from peer code review Lessons along the way Type stability: @code_warntype, JETTest.jl Performance impact of global's Strict typing, sub-types, union types

item.title: Readings
item.description: Week 5 Prior to Monday’s class Introduction to High Performance Computing for Scientists and Engineers Ch 2: Serial Optimization (26pg) and/or Performance Tips (just the bold section headings is enough for now; come back to read more about any specific tip when it applies to your project) Prior to Thursday’s class Submit Lab 4 Additional resources Julia Performance Tips ProfileView.
